storyInfo: 'Even if this gets me expelled from the Notarial Hall, I have to try. I must bring Cecelia to the Ecclesia Requietum. And at least let her say goodbye.'

attributes.content: *pant*...*pant*....
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: They're trying to run!
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Not on my watch!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Urgh... I'll cover you, run!
attributes.name: Serene Peddler

attributes.content: Interesting, a Perro blocking an attack for a Sarkaz... Neither of you is getting away.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Ezell, you stay put. Don't you even think about––
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: No funny business, I know. The terminal is on, Miss Fiammetta.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Trust me, all I care about is ensuring Cecelia's safety.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Change of plans. You can't stay here. Take Cecelia to the Basilica right now.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: It's more dangerous for us to stay in the open like this.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Let's go, Cecelia.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Huh? Weren't we going to the big statue? This is the wrong way.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: We're taking a little detour.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: What's a detour?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: It means we're going somewhere else right now...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: The Ecclesia Requietum.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.text: I planned to ask Miss Fiammetta for a favor after we reached the Basilica.
To have a high-ranking executor look after her, or the Pontifica Cohors to protect her...
And confirm that Cecelia poses no threat to Laterano...
To let Cecelia see her mother Feoria one more time before she
And yet she still has a halo...
If Cecelia was nothing more than another
How could a Sarkaz with a halo be allowed to leave the Basilica?
Even if... even if the worst doesn
How would she ever be allowed to leave?
Even if this gets me expelled from the Notarial Hall, I have to try.
I must bring Cecelia to the Ecclesia Requietum.
And at least let her say goodbye.

attributes.content: You can't run.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: She's gaining on us...
attributes.name: Merry Peddler

attributes.content: What do we do? What do we do? We can't shake her.
attributes.name: Serene Peddler

attributes.content: This is all my fault... That Liberi's not going to let us get away. Run! I'll hold her off!
attributes.name: Merry Peddler

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Serene Peddler

attributes.content: Hurry!
attributes.name: Merry Peddler

attributes.content: Stand back.
An...do...ain...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You're not getting away again.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: SHOW YOURSELF RIGHT NOW!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I truly cannot understand why His Holiness would adopt such a... hands-off attitude towards the Astray.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Can you tell me, Mostima, since the two of you are well-acquainted?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Not gonna talk about that with you.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: That's awfully petty of you.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I managed to keep him from killing me, only for you to very nearly do me in.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Hard to forget something like that.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: And that's the reason you always wear a hat in front of me? Doesn't it get uncomfortable?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I've been a Legata for this long already. It's just a hat.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: And as for you, you should probably let sleeping beasts lie.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Do you resent me, Mostima?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Laterano has always needed the Lateran Curia to keep things going, and that's always rubbed some people the wrong way. So I don't really care.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I think we have a little misunderstanding. That few fallen angels remain in the Church has nothing to do with the Church itself, but rather the Sankta nature of those fallen angels.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: My attitude may be a bit peculiar, but... do you not deem yourself an aberration?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Considering the way you're talking to me, aren't you afraid I'll become one of those 'regular fallen angels'?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: If that was a possibility, I wouldn't be 'talking to you that way' in the first place.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Fine. Let's talk business first. When's Fiammetta getting transferred?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Nothing good's gonna come out of her sticking to me.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Shouldn't you be asking her instead?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Brought it up before. No good.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: And you think I'd have a better shot?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Looks to me like the convenient part of power is you get to ignore what other people want.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: There's a price to be paid for that... So let's hear it. Why do you want Fiammetta transferred?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: She said she was my escort. Are you guys not curious as to what needs escorting?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Of course, there are some who think she's a warden or jailer to a fallen angel like me.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: And they don't know the first thing about Fiammetta.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I'm just the bait she's using to get at Andoian.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I'm sure she'd be terribly hurt if she heard you say that.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Alright, I'll try saying it another way... the bait is the Lock and Key I'm carrying on my back.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: And? What's wrong with letting Fiammetta do as she pleases? If she can get rid of Andoain or even capture him and bring him back to the Basilica, I'd be very pleased.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Or are you saying that even the two of you together can't catch Andoain?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Not necessarily. As long as Andoain is still fixated on the Lock and Key, he can't escape.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: But... let me think.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: What if Andoain has already found another path?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: What really sucks is I've moved on. Lemuen has moved on. Maybe even Andoain has moved on... But Fiammetta is still trapped in that rainy night eight years ago.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: There's no way I could bring that up with Fiammetta.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: And it's times like these where I start to miss that good old empathy...
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Oh wait, Fiammetta is a Liberi anyway. Wouldn't do me any good.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: This conversation sure brings me back.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: What, are you here to share the wisdom of one who has walked that path?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: If you'll allow me to exercise my authority as an elder.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: By all means.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Do you remember what you said to me eight years ago?
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: I don't want to ruin the moment we're having, but...
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Sorry, Your Holiness. I can't say that I do.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: It was, 'No... I still have things to do, and people to protect.'
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Velliv's impression of me is making my skin crawl.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You weren't willing to let me choose for you. So why, now, do you need to choose for Fiammetta?
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Each must find her own path. She must find it, and then traverse it.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Vel, this is my same answer to you.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: We're almost there, Cecelia.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I'm sorry I'm so slow, Mister Ezell... The sun is about to go behind the mountain.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: You're doing a great job! Even though we can't use public transit, we're almost off the plate. If I were as strong as Miss Fiammetta, you wouldn't have to work so hard.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: It's okay! Actually, Mamma took me out once and we went somewhere far, far away from home... just like here.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: But, won't Miss Fiammetta find out that we sneaked out here?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: If she's only looking for my terminal's signal... then hopefully that will buy me a little bit of time.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: The important thing is that we're here.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Is this where Mamma went?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Cecelia... I've been thinking about how to explain this to you for a long time.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Feoria, your mama... is here. But she's also not.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I have no way of letting you see your mama again, but at least you'll be able to say goodbye to her here.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Mister Ezell... I don't think I get... what you're saying...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: If she's here, but she's also not, does that mean... she went somewhere else?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Where did she go?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Let's head in first.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Before my father passed away, he always hoped there would be nothing but smiles at his funeral. That we'd see no tears. But, I...
attributes.name: Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: If I may, I believe what your esteemed father truly wished was for you not to fall into grief over his passing.
attributes.name: Warm Prioress

attributes.content: Whether through tears or laughter, if that is your way of sending him off... then I'm sure he will gladly accept your sentiments.
attributes.name: Warm Prioress

attributes.content: Thank you... Seniora Prioress...
attributes.name: Lateran Citizen

attributes.content: Allow me to accompany you around the flower fields outside.
attributes.name: Warm Prioress

attributes.content: Mister Ezell, that lady also said that her father 'passed away'...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Yes... People who pass away all come here.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: People who are alive come to send them off... And after that, they carry on the wishes of the person who passed away, and continue on with life.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Then what about the people who passed away? What do they do?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Maybe... they're watching us from up high in the sky.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: So we won't be able to see them again because they went into the sky?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Cecelia, this is for you.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: This is... Mamma's guardian gun?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: My mama and papa were both executors for the Notarial Hall. I didn't see them much when I was little... and it was my nonno who raised me.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Nonno really loved his gun, and he'd tell me stories about his younger days every time he polished it.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: He told me about the battles he fought, his friends, how he met my nonna, and the embarrassing things my papa did as a kid...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: When I saw my nonno's gun, I would think back to the stories he told me.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Later, my nonno passed away. I was only a little older than you are now.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: An executor from the Notarial Hall came and took away his guardian gun.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Just like how I was supposed to take away your mama's gun.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Ezell slowly crouches down and places Feoria's gun in Cecelia's hand.
She lowers her head and looks at her mother's patron firearm.
Ezell gently holds Cecelia's hand.
Warm drops of water fall onto the embossed floral pattern of the patron firearm's grip, collecting into a little pool in the young girl's palms.
Mister Ezell... Why am I crying...?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I watered the plants in the backyard every week, just like my nonno had taught me. When they blossomed, I was very happy and called for him to come and see.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: But it was only when I called for him that I realized he wasn't there anymore.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I would never see my nonno again, or his gun.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Death is the last goodbye you'll ever say to someone.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: But, to say goodbye is to overcome death.
For there to be a 'goodbye,' the living must move forward while the dead stay behind.
A 'goodbye' is the longing that the living have for the dead. It is proof that the dead lived.
And that is why we must say goodbye.
attributes.name: Friar
